scripts.coverage: npx rimraf .nyc_output_combined && npx lerna exec --concurrency 1 npm run coverage && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:combine: npx rimraf .nyc_output && npx mv .nyc_output_combined .nyc_output && npx mv ./build/brazil-documentation/coverage/cobertura-coverage.xml ./build/brazil-documentation/coverage/coverage.xml
scripts.coverage:report: npm run coverage:combine && npx nyc report
scripts.docs: npm run docs:reference && npm run docs:dev
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:reference && npx vuepress build docs
scripts.docs:reference: cd ./packages/litexa && npm run rdoc && npx mv ./src/documentation/reference.md ../../docs/reference/README.md && cd ../../
scripts.postinstall: npx lerna bootstrap && npx lerna link convert
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run coverage
scripts.test: npx lerna exec --concurrency 1 npm run test
scripts.update-lock-files: npm install --package-lock-only && npx lerna exec -- npm install --package-lock-only
